text: Jesus Gonzalez Margaride (born September 28, 1967 in A Pontenova) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: He is a T36 type athlete. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He race and finished in 7 in the 5,000 meter T34-T37 race. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney, Australia. He finished third in the 1,500 meter T36 race. == References == Category:Spanish long-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1967 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T36 Category:Galician people
title: Jesús González Margaride
